original_text: The younger daughter also gave birth to a son. She called him Ben-Ammi. He became the ancestor of the Ammonites.
korean_text: 작은 딸도 아들을 낳아 이름을 벤암미라 하였으니 오늘날 암몬 자손의 조상이었더라

sentences.original_text: The younger daughter also gave birth to a son.
He became the ancestor of the Ammonites.
